00169 LinkedList<T>::LinkedList()

00172  currentSize(0)

00180 LinkedList<T>::LinkedList(const LinkedList& rhs)
00181 :head(new node),
00182  z(new node),
00183  currentSize(0)
00184 {
00185     head->next = z;
00186     z->next = z;

00198     for(int i=0; i<rhs.currentSize; i++) {

00213 template<class T>
00214 void LinkedList<T>::deleteNode(node* n) {
00215 
00216     if(n->next != z) {
00217         deleteNode(n->next);
00218     }
00219     delete n;
00220 }

00223 template<class T>
00224 void LinkedList<T>::add(int i, T t) {
00225 
00226     if(i == currentSize) {
00227         addLast(t);
00228     }
00229     else if(i == 0) {
00230         addFirst(t);
00231     }
00232     else {
00233         node* current;
00234         node* temp = new node;
00235         temp->data = t;
00236         current = head->next;
00237         int j = 0;
00238         while(j < i-1) {
00239             current = current->next;
00240             j++;
00241         }
00242         temp->next = current->next;
00243         current->next = temp;
00244         currentSize++;
00245     }
00246 }

00250 void LinkedList<T>::addFirst(T t) {
00251 
00252     node *temp = new node;
00253     temp->data = t;
00254     temp->next = head->next;
00255     head->next = temp;
00256     currentSize++;
00257 }

00260 template<class T>
00261 void LinkedList<T>::addLast(T t) {
00262 
00263     node* temp = new node;
00264     temp->data = t;
00265     temp->next = z;
00266 
00267     if(currentSize == 0) {
00268         head->next = temp;
00269     }
00270     else {
00271         node* temp2 = head;
00272         while(temp2->next != z) {
00273             temp2 = temp2->next;
00274         }
00275         temp2->next = temp;
00276     }
00277     currentSize++;
00278 }

00281 template<class T>
00282 T& LinkedList<T>::get(int i) {
00283 
00284     node *current;
00285     current = head->next;
00286     int j = 0;
00287     while((j < i) && (current->next != z)) {
00288         current = current->next;
00289         j++;
00290     }
00291     return current->data;
00292 }

00314 template<class T>
00315 T LinkedList<T>::remove(int i) {
00316 
00317     if(i == currentSize){
00318         return removeLast();
00319     }
00320     else if(i == 0) {
00321         return removeFirst();
00322     }
00323     else {
00324         node *current, *temp;
00325         T obj;
00326         current = head->next;
00327         int j = 0;
00328         while(j < i-1) {
00329             current = current->next;
00330             j++;
00331         }
00332         temp = current->next;
00333         current->next = temp->next;
00334         obj = temp->data;
00335         currentSize--;
00336         delete temp;
00337         return obj;
00338     }
00339 }

00342 template<class T>
00343 T LinkedList<T>::removeFirst() {
00344 
00345     if(currentSize != 0) {
00346         node *temp;
00347         T obj;
00348         temp = head->next;
00349         head->next = temp->next;
00350         obj = temp->data;
00351         delete temp;
00352         currentSize--;
00353         return obj;
00354     }
00355     return T();

00359 template<class T>
00360 T LinkedList<T>::removeLast() {
00361 
00362     if(currentSize != 0) {
00363         node *temp, *temp2;
00364         T obj;
00365         temp = head->next;
00366         while(temp->next != z) {
00367             temp2 = temp;
00368             temp = temp->next;
00369         }
00370         obj = temp->data;
00371         delete temp;
00372         temp2->next = z;
00373         currentSize--;
00374         return obj;
00375     }
00376     return T();
00377 }

00381 void LinkedList<T>::set(int i, T t) {
00382 
00383     node *current;
00384     current = head->next;
00385     int j = 0;
00386     while((j < i) && (current->next != z)) {
00387         current = current->next;
00388         j++;
00389     }
00390     current->data = t;

00401 template<class T>
00402 void LinkedList<T>::clear() {
00403 
00404     if(currentSize != 0) {
00405         deleteNode(head->next);
00406         head->next = z;
00407     }
00408     currentSize = 0;
00409 }
